data.title: K Balachander To N Lingusamy: 15 Tamil Directors Who Directed Straight Telugu Films
data.meta_description: Telugu-Tamil ivi rendu vere cinema industries ainapptiki ee 2 languages lo eh cinema hit Aina audience okelaga receive chesukuntaru. Not just movies, star
data.text:
Telugu-Tamil ivi rendu vere cinema industries ainapptiki ee 2 languages lo eh cinema hit Aina audience okelaga receive chesukuntaru. Not just movies, star heroes, heroines, directors , producers and technicians antha oka mutual understanding tho both industries lo kalisi-melisi pani chestuntaru.

Ila Tamil lo top position lo unna directos kondaru mana Telugu lo kuda mana heroes ni petti straight Telugu movies chesaru. Induku best example… recent ga occhina The Warrior movie and the director N. Lingusamy eh.

Lingusamy Tamil director Ainapptiki Mana Ram tho straight Telugu movie chesadu…Ila iyana okkare kadu Balachander, Mani Ratnam nundi Telugu lo straight Telugu movies chesina Tamil directors list peddagane undi.

Here’s the list of Tamil Directors Who Directed Straight Telugu Films.

1. K. Balachander – Marocharitra, Rudraveena

Tamil lo legendary director aina K. Balachander garu Telugu lo 2 straight movies chesaru indulo Kamal Haasan tho Marocharithra movie and Chiranjeevi tho national award winning movie Rudraveena okati.

2. Mani Ratnam – Geethanjali

Ika all time classic mana Mani Ratnam garu Telugu lo chesina oke oka straight film Geethanjali. Akkineni Nagarjuna tho chesina ee movie all time classic ga nilichipoye cinema aindi.

3. Bharathi Raja – Seethakoka Chiluka

Bharathi Raja ee veteran director Tamil lo chala cult movies tisaru and Telugu lo Kotha Jeevithalu, Seethakoka Chiluka, Yuvatharam Pilichindi & Jamadagni lanti straight telugu films direct chesaru.

4. Suresh Krishna – Prema, Dharma Chakram, Master & Raghavendra

Ika Tamil lo Baasha lanti alltime cult direct chesina Suresh Krishna, Telugu lo Venky tho Prema Dharma Chakram movies, Chiru tho Master, Daddy & Nag tho Autoidriver lanti movies chesaru.

5. M. Saravanan – Ganesh

Ika tamil lo Journey lanti hit movie tisina Tamil director Saravanan, Telugu lo Ram tho Ganesh chesadu.

6. Dharani – Bangaram

Tamil lo Vikram tho Dhool, Vijay Ghilli(remake of okkadu) lanti noted movies chesina Dharani mana Pawan Kalyan Bangaram straight telugu film chesadu.

7. Selvaraghavan – Aadavari Matalaku Ardhale Verule

7/G lanti bilingual hit taruvatha Selva Raghavan (AKA Sri Raghava In Telugu) Vankatesh tho Aadavari Matalaku Ardhale Verule straight Telugu movie chesadu.

8. SJ Suryah – Kushi & Puli

Ika Tamil lo Vaali lanti sensational movie tho debut chesina SJ Surya, Telugu lo Kushi tho debut chesadu. Kushi, Nani and Puli are straight Telugu movies by SJ Surya.

9. A.R. Murugadoss – Stalin, Spyder

Ghajini tho Telugu vallaki baga parichayam aina Murugadoss, Telugu lo Megastar Tho Stalin and Mahesh Babu tho Spyder tisaru and idi actual ga Bilingual.

10. Gautham Menon – Ye Maya Chesave & Saahasam Swaasaga Saagipo

YMC movie Telugu and Tamil lo oke sari shoot chesaru same NAni tho tisina Yeto Vellipoindi Manasau kuda anthe. Kani Naga Chaitanya tho tisina Saahasam Swaasaga Saagipo matram straight telugu film by GVM.

11. Mohan Raja – Hanuman Junction

Jayam, Bommarillu, Ready lanti movies ni Tamil lo remake chesina Mohan Raja long back Telugu lo Hanuman Junction ane movie chesaru.

12. Prabhu Deva – Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana

Choreographer aina Prabhu Deva ‘Nuvvostanante Nenoddantana’ movie tho director ga maripoyaru. Idi ayana Debut movie as director and Straight Telugu film kuda.

13. Vishnuvardhan – Panjaa

Ika Tamil lo Billa, Gambler lanti action movies tisina Vishnuvardhan Telugu lo Pawan Kalyan tho Panjaa movie tisaru.

14. Lawrence – Mass, Don & Rebel

Choreographer nundi director ga marina Lawrence first movie mass debut as director and straight Telugu movie kuda. Kanchana franchise tho Tamil lo busy unna Telugu lo Don and Rebel lanti straight telugu films tisaru.

15. N. Linguswamy – The Warrior

Run, Pandem Kodi movies tho Telugu vallaki kuda telisina Lingusamy – chala gap taruvatha straight Telugu film aina The Warrior tho megaphone pattukunnaru.
